item.title: Hugo
item.description: hugo installation, publish and matainance base on Mac OS install hugo install brew use brew to install hugo brew install hugo check version hugo version generate website generate your website folder hugo new site myblog get a theme https://themes.gohugo.io/ start site on local host hugo server -t m10c -- buildDrafts m10c is the theme name use “hugo server” to check local website later deploy on github page creat a new repository, the name must same as the user name + .

item.title: Hugo
item.description: hugo installation, publish and matainance base on Mac OS install hugo install brew use brew to install hugo brew install hugo check version hugo version generate website generate your website folder hugo new site myblog get a theme https://themes.gohugo.io/ start site on local host hugo server -t m10c -- buildDrafts m10c is the theme name use “hugo server” to check local website later deploy on github page creat a new repository, the name must same as the user name + .

item.title: simple markdown
item.description: simple markdown “#”的数量决定标题字体的大小 文字左右两边用一个*夹住表示斜体 *文字斜体* 文字左右两边用两个*夹住表示加粗 **文字加粗** 清单： 在句子前面加“-”， 缩紧写法可以形成巢状构图 分割线： *** 或者 — 都是三个 链接： <>

item.title: simple markdown
item.description: simple markdown “#”的数量决定标题字体的大小 文字左右两边用一个*夹住表示斜体 *文字斜体* 文字左右两边用两个*夹住表示加粗 **文字加粗** 清单： 在句子前面加“-”， 缩紧写法可以形成巢状构图 分割线： *** 或者 — 都是三个 链接： <>

item.title: Lc_42
item.description: Trapping Rain Water Main concept 找到左右两边最高点 以每个slot为单元记录这个单元的存水量 该单元存水量 = 此时最近的最低点 - 该单元高度 随时更新最近最低点 code class Solution { public int trap(int[] height) { int res = 0; if (height == null || height.length == 0) { return 0; } //find highest int highLeft = 0; for(int i = 0; i < height.length; i++) { if (height[i] > height[highLeft]) { highLeft = i; } } int highRight = 0; for(int i = height.
